GITEX, one of the largest technology exhibitions in the world, opened today with the participation of 3500 companies from 130 countries. Http://t.co/afNKIT7Ir1
Smart government services and applications that we have seen today promise a qualitative shift in government work. All thanks to the dedicated teams

It is necessary to harness technology in the service and comfort of the human wherever he is .. and in achieving growth and happiness .. and vice versa .. We will not hesitate to use any technology for this purpose
Today we opened Gitex, one of the largest international technology exhibition, which hosts more than 3500 companies from 130 countries
The government smart services and apps we saw today speak of a major leap in the government work, thanks to our dedicated govt. teams
Technology is there to make people's life happier and easier, and we will not save an effort to achieve this purpose

Healthcare sector accounts for 11% of the total European workforce, or 25 million jobs, for 10% of the EU's GDP. Speaking at #WorldHealthSmt
Health care systems remain national responsibility. But #EU can improve context & support MS  action. #WorldHealthSmt
Health is one of the main strands of the #EU's development agenda. EU biggest donor, representing 56% of global public aid. #WorldHealthSmt
Health is a fundamental right of every human being. #WorldHealthSmt
Health is a global issue requiring strong global cooperation. I commend the #WorldHealthSmt's contribution to this.
Watch recorded version of my speech at #WorldHealthSmt at around 21.00 here: http://t.co/ZnbrvwSnHR

I express my deepest gratitude to the native Azerbaijani people, who has shown great confidence in me and elected me as President.
The people of Azerbaijan gave their voice and voice to the work done and expressed their opinions and wishes about the future of this vote.
Today Azerbaijan's unequivocal policy - courageous policy, based on the will of the people, national (cont) http://t.co/VmmpqZ3veP
There is enough factor in looking at the future with optimism. The experience of the last decade shows that "people", (cont) http://t.co/lebR3JjUDb
A landmark in our economic growth plan - Hinkley nuclear power plant means billions in investment, thousands of jobs and energy security.
Today Azerbaijan has managed to occupy a worthy place in the world as an independent state. Azerbaijan should be a stronger country.
We are building a powerful Azerbaijani state and I am sure that we will build. In order to achieve all the goals, our independent policy should continue.
Our policy is based on national interests. Our policy is directed at strengthening independence.
The confidence of the people and showing me great confidence in ten years, of course, also inspire me, (cont) http://t.co/Ib7DylN6NV
The experience of recent years, at the same time, clearly demonstrates the advantages of our independence.
However, independent Azerbaijan has succeeded in achieving these achievements. However, when we have our destiny, we have succeeded.
The people of Azerbaijan are the owners of their destiny, and Azerbaijan has never been so strong in history.
As our balance increases, of course, our capabilities will also grow and will not come to anyone after that (cont) http://t.co/ADpkZ0Qj9w
No one will ever be able to isolate Azerbaijan from any project.
We all should continue to work and try to develop our country, to make our independence forever and ever.

Reminder: this afternoon, I will be answering questions live on Twitter (16.30 CET). Tag yours with #Askthepresident. http://t.co/tpUsK0vFl4
Rappel : je répondrai en direct à vos questions sur Twitter cet après-midi (16.30 CET).  Posez vos questions en utilisant #Askthepresident.
Visiting the @BILD newsroom in Berlin with editor-in-chief @KaiDiekmann http://t.co/CvlYNwkVbK
Welcome all to this live Twitter Q&A on innovation. I may not answer all Qs, but will try to answer as many as possible #Askthepresident
RT @schneiderfa77: #Askthepresident: how can the EU increase digital #literacy so users learn to look behind the codes that guide usage? ht…
.@schneiderfa77 Need to bridge digital skills gap. By 2015, could be 900k unfilled vacancies for IT specialists.
RT @jjoyvc: How does Europe stand in the future growth of emerging countries?#askthepresident @euHvR
.@jjoyvc Positive that 1000s of mlns left poverty; at same time we do everything needed to increase competitiveness EU vs emerging economies
RT @edwardclaessens: @euHvR innovation from telcos needed, says Kroes. Will there be financial room for it by detopping (cont) http://t.co/…
.@edwardclaessens More #innovation needed - also from telcos. Next #EUbudget has 40% spending increase on R&D and competitiveness.
Speech by President Suleiman directly from the port of Beirut at 11:50 am tomorrow afternoon
RT @ESES2014: Should the EU support shale gas exploration in order to secure energy security for future generations? #Askthepresident #ESES…
.@ESES2014 In May, #EUCO asked @EU_Commission to assess indigenous sources of energy including #shale gas.
RT @koenvdk: Innovation is starting to destroy jobs faster than it can create them (Robotics, AI, 3D prints, ...). How can society cope? #A…
.@koenvdk actually, the countries with highly developed IT are also the countries with low unemployment.
RT @korestis: #Askthepresident How probable is it that Council agrees on data protection and #connected_continent before EU2014 elections?
.@korestis Europe needs to be a consumer-friendly, competitive #connected_continent.  #Digital Single Market by 2015 (1/2)
.@korestis I want #EUCO to call for adoption of #dataprotection regulation, law enforcement & cyber security directives next year (2/2)
RT @iteuropa: #Askthepresident How do we get scale for local European technology when internet regulations vary so much, sometimes even wit…
.@iteuropa the fragmentation of the digital market is precisely a key challenge and high on our agenda.
RT @diegod_a: @euHvR how can the reforms in the Data Protection Directive affect EU innovation #Askthepresident
.@diegod_a  we need right balance between protection of privacy and benefits of #innovation  #EU economy & society
RT @Kim_Maes: @euHvR How can cities and governments learn from #innovation strategies in SMEs and multinationals? #AskthePresident
.@Kim_Maes, @VeerleDeparcq Cities & govts should think #digital much more than now. (1/3)
.@Kim_Maes, @VeerleDeparcq Public administrations could make savings of up to 20% by moving to eGovernment, eHealth & eProcurement. (2/3)
.@Kim_Maes, @VeerleDeparcq Online gov services should be easy & intuitive. Some EU Member States (like @e_estonia) are frontrunners. (3/3)
RT @PEC_SPF: @euHvR How does the #EU foster and encourage #innovation ? And what sector is most in need of innovation in the Eurozone?  #As…
.@PEC_SPF #EUCO calls for full European Research Area by end 2014. Will foster and encourage #innovation.
During #CitizenshipWeek I encourage everyone to make the most of our contributions. http://t.co/BO1WgiAXud
.@Anne_Hoel C'est surtout à la Commission de prendre des initiatives législatives (le Traité). Ca fonctionne bien.
RT @FabienCazenave: @euHvR peut-on être à la fois Président de la Commission et du Conseil européen d'après votre expérience ? #Askthepresi…
.@FabienCazenave Il faut plutôt relancer la croissance et les emplois plutôt qu'une débat institutionnelle
RT @archypel: #Askthepresident what is the EU doing on social leverage (compared to financial (banking) leverage)? As poverty is growing ag…
.@archypel We will discuss social dimension of #EMU at #EUCO this week. Jobs & growth best solution to poverty - and our highest priority.
RT @Isabruss: #askthepresident @euhvr now live https://t.co/tXwudD1Tfs
RT @tnemessiacne: @euHvR @EPOorg #Askthepresident Wath is the best european innovation? Internet, Mp3, ecology ?
.@tnemessiacne Difficult to choose -  Europe has world-class science. Latest #Nobelprize in physics to the European fathers of #Higgsboson
RT @EUCouncilTVNews: Behind the scenes @euHVR Twitter Q&A #Askthepresident #vine https://t.co/3QWKq4csOm
RT @spacepup84: .@euHvR Are you planning outreach to convince the British people that it is in their interest to stay in the EU? #Askthepre…
.@spacepup84 As I have said many times, it is for the UK people to decide whether they wish to remain in the #EU. (1/2)
.@spacepup84 However, I and other EU leaders would much prefer to keep a fully engaged #UKinEU (2/2)
RT @Isabruss: @euhvr #askthepresident live Twitter Q&A in full swing http://t.co/GP4uHr8zI6
.@EUPO962 George Next #EUbudget has 40% spending increase on R&D, innovation and competitiveness.
.@SGHutchence never had Marmite, but would love to taste it.
.@EUPO962 Fiona Fight against tax avoidance/evasion high on agenda - also for G8, G20 & OECD (1/2)
Good progress on automatic exchange of information on all income all over Europe. (2/2)
RT @A_Liberty_Rebel: Can you please reveal the result of the 2014 Eurovision Song Contest? #AskthePresident
.@A_Liberty_Rebel it's time that another Belgian wins!
RT @amaadona7a: @euHvR #Askthepresident what steps is the council taking to include other actors like youth and scholars in the effort to a…
.@amaadona7a Around € 8bn agreed for Youth Employment Initiative. Up to the MS to introduce projects

Last questions please, we will finish in 5 minutes
RT @Phineas_Barnum: @euHvR L'élection du président du Conseil européen est-il suffisamment démocratique? #Askthepresident
Il est élu par les chefs d'Etats et des gouvernements, tous et toutes élus par le peuple
Thank you all for your questions. Until next time  http://t.co/U3WGCYjcs7
